Container.Name: Sysco Sync App
Container.Overview: A tool to backup selected directories into Amazon AWS cloud.
Container.Description: Please read README.md in SyncApp project.

Config.Name: Config directory
Config.Description: This is a place where you put config.yml file.

Config.Name: Storage path
Config.Description: This is a root mount point for backup data. I.e. '/mnt/disk1/Glacier/file.mov' will become '/storage/file.mov'.

Config.Name: Environment type
Config.Description: Environment in which application will run. Can be prod or dev.

Config.Name: Web UI
Config.Description: Web UI port used to monitor backup process.
